h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai
content: This first Relic of the Great Sage will now appear in your inventory menu, and allow you to choose to awaken one of three passive perks:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai'.
The content is as follows:
This first Relic of the Great Sage will now appear in your inventory menu, and allow you to choose to awaken one of three passive perks:
